name: JimJump Web Edition
description:
Updated Game-play Trailer After Submission:


2 Player game requires 2 controllers plugged in and turned on before the browser is opened. If your two player game has both the characters being controlled by one controller, make sure both controllers are connected and turned on then restart the browser and run the game.

Controller Input:

Left analog stick left right to move character

B button - crouch

A button - jump

Start button - main menu

Keyboard Input:

A - left

S - duck

D - Right

Spacebar - Jump

ESC - main menu
